policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:Include>
                    <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="e513b52b-7d41-416f-9906-17f8e12b6d6a"/>
                    <L7p:PolicyName stringValue="ABC Rules"/>
                </L7p:Include>
                <L7p:JavaScript>
                    <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Name stringValue="hello"/>
                    <L7p:Script stringValue="var a = 0;"/>
                </L7p:JavaScript>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
